  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractModel
    the base class for all models beans in the pages context
    AssetRelated  
    Component
    the delegate class for a component itself (the implementation)
    Component.ComponentPieces  
    Component.TypeResourceStrategy
    Compatible to AbstractModel.determineResource(Resource).
    Container
    The Container is an Element to arrange some Elements within dynamically...
    ContentDriven<ContentType extends ContentModel>
    the abstract base class for all resource with a 'jcr:content' child which contains the resource properties
    ContentModel<ParentModel extends ContentDriven>
    the abstract base class for all 'jcr:content' child element model implementations such a resource is almost the versioned part of an element in the Pages content
    ContentTypeFilter
    a filter implementation to determine a set of potential children types or templates of a target resource
    ContentVersion<ContentType extends ContentModel>
    Can represent either information about the historical version of a content in a release in comparison to the previous release, or information about the status of a content in the workspace in comparison to a release (usually the current release).
    ContentVersion.StatusModel
    Pages-Adapter around PlatformVersionsService.Status.
    Element  
    ElementTypeFilter
    a filter to determine the allowed elements for a set of containers (all containers of a page)

    Folder

    Homepage
    the Page model for a sites homepage
    Image  
    IParSys  
    IParSys.IParsSysComparator  
    LanguageRoot
    the model of a resource which is the root of a language split in the context of the current page (the site with the configured site language set is used if no language split declared) assuming that a language split root page has siblings for the other languages of a site; the alternatives of the current page are searched in the siblings path relative to the language root
    Link
